cookingTips: Char poblanos completely until blackened, then steam in covered bowl for maximum tenderness when peeling
Make a careful slit and remove seeds gently to keep the pepper whole and intact
Whip egg whites to stiff peaks and fold in yolks for light, fluffy batter that puffs beautifully when fried
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user master the traditional technique of charring and peeling poblanos properly, then guide them through making voluminous egg white batter.
